Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and grease a 9x13-inch baking dish.
In a large bowl, combine margarine and sugar until well blended. Incorporate the yolks, then alternate adding flour and baking powder with the milk.

In a separate bowl, whip egg whites until they have doubled in volume. Gently fold the beaten whites into the batter. Spread the mixture into a greased 9 x 12 inch pan. Arrange sliced bananas on top of the batter. In a small bowl, combine the 2 tablespoons of sugar and cinnamon; sprinkle this mixture over the bananas.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 30 to 35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. Let it cool.
